config.response_template: {     {% if body.ListedMerchants and #body.ListedMerchants > 0 then %}         "contacts":[            {% for i, contact in ipairs(body.ListedMerchants[1].MerchantContactList) do %}                {                    "id": {{contact.Id}},                    "name": "{{contact.ContactName}}",                    {% if contact.ContactType then %}                    "typeId": {{contact.ContactType.Id}},                    "typeName": "{{contact.ContactType.Name}}",                    {% else %}                    "typeId": null,                    "typeName": null,                    {% end %}                    "email": "{{contact.Email}}",                    "phone": "{{contact.PhoneNumber}}",                    "mobilePhone": "{{contact.MobilePhoneNumber}}"                {% if i == #body.ListedMerchants[1].MerchantContactList then %}                }                {% else %}                },                {% end %}            {% end %}        ],    {% end %}    "messages": {% if body.Message then %} ["{{body.Message}}"] {% else %} [] {% end %} }
